StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterByHighSchoolID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@HighSchoolID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT TOP 1 RTrim(rp.Rank_Code) as RankCode, RTrim(p.Last_Name) as LastName, RTrim(p.First_Name) as FirstName, RTrim(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME) as MiddleName, rp.rowguid as RecruiterID, msr.LastUpdateDate FROM RSSOSS.USMC.vwMcrissPerson p, MCRISS.dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngOrganiza.on org ON hs.ORGANIZATION_ID = org.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorZip msz ON SUBSTRING(hs.ZIP_CODE,1,5) = msz.Zip INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.MapsSectorRecruiter msr ON msz.SectorID = msr.SectorID INNER JOIN RSSOSS.USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp ON msr.Recrui.ngPersonId = rp.rowguid
WHERE rp.Recrui.ng_Person_ID = p.Person_ID AND hs.rowguid = @HighSchoolID
ORDER BY MSR.LastUpdateDate DESC
END
